name: happy-hour-summer-squall
title: Happy Hour: Summer Squalls
author: Christy Frink
contentEncoded:
• We thought we were in the clear tonight, but it looks like the storms will be sticking around into the evening hours, though the worst should already be gone. Expect a lot of wind and lightning, and our Twitterers were reporting hail around Nolensville. [Tennessean]
  • Belmont U. is already preparing for the October Town Hall Presidential Debate. Looks like they may have some extra tickets, but they won’t know until three days out. Yes we can? [WSMV]
  • Despite Vandy’s loss over the weekend, they’ve landed a spot in the NCAA tournament and are set to play Arizona State. [Tennessean]
  • An ocean explorer is warning Tennesseans to stop littering because it’s killing the ocean critters. Be sure to clean up after all of your Memorial Day shindigs. You never know where your trash will end up. [Tennessean]

Photo by cwage.
